(Simplified: 戗)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 倉 indicates the sound; 戈 (spear) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 倉 [ cāng ] granary, barn; cabin, berth
    • 戈 [ gē ] spear, lance, halberd
①逆，反方向：戧風。戧水。
②(言語)衝突：兩個人說戧了。
戧風 [ qiāng fēng ]: a headwind; a contrary wind
戧順不吃 [ qiāng shùn bù chī ]: to yield neither to coercion nor to persuasion (idiom)

戧字的基本解释

戧
qiāng

戧
qiàng
均见“戗”。

戧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chuāng］
［《集韻》初良切，平陽，初。］
“創1”的古字。“戗1”的繁体字。
[②]［qiāng］
“戗2”的繁体字。
(1)逆，不顺。
(2)倒竖。
(3)决裂。
[③]［qiàng］
“戗3”的繁体字。
(1)撑；支撑。
(2)大堤外围对大堤起加固和保护作用的小堤。
(3)在器物图案上填嵌金银等作为装饰。参见“戧3金”。亦指涂上的色彩。
(4)浸渍。

戧字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【戈字部】　戧； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页413第25
【玉篇】古文創字。【說文】傷也。餘詳刀部十畫。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chuāng］
["Jiyun" Chu Liangqi, Pingyang, Chu. ]
The ancient character of "Chuang 1". Traditional characters for "戗1".
[②]［qiāng］
"戗2" in traditional characters.
(1) Inverse, not smooth.
(2) Upside down.
(3) Breaking.
[③]［qiàng］
"戗3" in traditional characters.
(1) Support; support.
(2) The small embankment that strengthens and protects the embankment at the periphery of the embankment.
(3) Inlay gold and silver etc. as decoration on the patterns of the utensils. See "3 gold". Also refers to the color applied.
(4) Impregnation.
Arrogant

[Jade articles] Ancient cultural creation characters. [Said the text] hurt too. Ten paintings of Yu Xiang's knife department.
